subject: New 12-469 video, this one is a bit shorter
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
In case you don't want to watch the 23 minute video which includes a 
step-by-step description on how I setup my system, showing a practical 
use of the three Radio Shack 12-469 radios, all modified, in a ghost 
box type configuration I have produced a shorter video (2 parts) which 
only shows an overview of how my system setup works.

These videos are on YouTube and can be seen here:

Part 1:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HH_9MdJdRzo
(10 minute video)

Part 2:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=unVPgqoBhx8
(4 minute video)

- Mike
